alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Grundy; Kendall; La Salle; Northern Will; Southern Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:32PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Kendall, northeastern La Salle, western Will, southeastern De Kalb and Grundy Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 532 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sheridan to 6 miles east of Streator. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Aurora, Joliet, Naperville, Bolingbrook, Romeoville, Plainfield, Woodridge, Oswego, Lockport, Ottawa, Yorkville, Streator, Morris, Channahon, Minooka, Plano, Sandwich, Braidwood, Wilmington and Coal City. Including the following interstates... I-55 between mile markers 219 and 269. I-80 between mile markers 88 and 136. I-355 between mile markers 10 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: De Kalb; Grundy; Kendall; La Salle; Northern Will; Southern Will
